sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FormBuilder, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { UserService } from '../user.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-user-add', templateUrl: './user-add.component.html', styleUrls: ['./user-add.component.scss'], }) export class UserAddComponent implements OnInit { registerForm: FormGroup; availableRoles: string[] = []; errorMessage: string | null = null; constructor( private fb: FormBuilder, private userService: UserService, private router: Router ) { this.registerForm = this.fb.group({ userName: ['', Validators.required], email: ['', [Validators.required, Validators.email]], name: ['', Validators.required], surname: ['', Validators.required], birthDate: ['', Validators.required], password: [ '', [ Validators.required, Validators.minLength(6), Validators.pattern('(?=.*[a-z])(?=.*[A-Z])(?=.*\\d)(?=.*[!@#$%^&*()_+}{":;\',.<>?/]).*'), ], ], confirmPassword: ['', Validators.required], role: ['', Validators.required], // Role seçimi için alan }); } ngOnInit(): void { this.loadRoles(); } loadRoles(): void { this.userService.getAvailableRoles().subscribe({ next: (roles) => { this.availableRoles = roles; }, error: (error) => { console.error('Failed to load roles:', error); this.errorMessage = 'Roles could not be loaded.'; }, }); } onSubmit(): void { if (this.registerForm.invalid) { console.error('Form is invalid'); return; } const formData = { RegisterDto: { UserName: this.registerForm.get('userName')?.value, Email: this.registerForm.get('email')?.value, Name: this.registerForm.get('name')?.value, Surname: this.registerForm.get('surname')?.value, BirthDate: this.registerForm.get('birthDate')?.value, Password: this.registerForm.get('password')?.value, ConfirmPassword: this.registerForm.get('confirmPassword')?.value, }, RoleDto: { Roles: [this.registerForm.get('role')?.value], // Seçilen role buraya ekleniyor }, }; this.userService.getRegisterRole(formData).subscribe({ next: (response) => { console.log('Registration successful:', response); this.router.navigate(['/admin/user/user-list']); }, error: (error) => { console.error('Registration failed:', error); this.errorMessage = error.error?.message || 'Registration failed.'; }, }); } }

Qeydiyyat

User Name is required.
Valid email is required.
Name is required.
Surname is required.
Birth Date is required.
Password must be at least 6 characters and include one uppercase letter, one number, and one special character.
Confirmation Password must match the Password.
Select Role:
Please select a role.
